stories.Title: Touchdown! Axiom Space is back
stories.Description: The Crew Dragon spacecraft returned to Earth with the Ax-2 crew, landing safely in the Gulf of Mexico. Marking the culmination of its eight-day stay at the International Space Station.
stories.Tweet: Touchdown! Axiom Space is back 📦 The Crew Dragon spacecraft returned to Earth with the Ax-2 crew, landing safely in the Gulf of Mexico. Marking the culmination of its eight-day stay at the International Space Station. #axiomspace https://spacenews.com/second-axiom-space-private-astronaut-mission-concludes-with-splashdown/

stories.Title: Aporia announces partnership with Databricks
stories.Description: With the deployment of Aporia's observability platform directly on Databricks, their collaboration aims to provide customers with enhanced monitoring capabilities for machine learning models.
stories.Tweet: Aporia announces partnership with Databricks 📦 With the deployment of Aporia's observability platform directly on Databricks, their collaboration aims to provide customers with enhanced monitoring capabilities for machine learning models. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/aporia-and-databricks-partner-to-enhance-real-time-monitoring-of-ml-models/

stories.Title: Nvidia to revolutionize gaming (again)
stories.Description: Powered by AI, the company's ACE service allows game developers to create non-player characters that engage in real-time conversations and even display animated facial expressions.
stories.Tweet: Nvidia to revolutionize gaming (again) 📦 Powered by AI, the company's ACE service allows game developers to create non-player characters that engage in real-time conversations and even display animated facial expressions. #nvidia https://www.businessinsider.com/nvidia-ai-transform-video-game-experience-npc-non-player-character-2023-5

stories.Title: A cinematic experience with Roll
stories.Description: Roll is here to redefine video production on your iPhone. With intelligent AI and cloud-based technology, the company aims to transform ordinary footage into professional-grade projects.
stories.Tweet: A cinematic experience with Roll 📦 Roll is here to redefine video production on your iPhone. With intelligent AI and cloud-based technology, the company aims to transform ordinary footage into professional-grade projects. #ai https://petapixel.com/2023/05/31/roll-is-an-iphone-app-that-uses-ai-to-simulate-camera-movement/

stories.Title: Let's hear what the experts have to say
stories.Description: Known as one of the "godfathers" of artificial intelligence, Yoshua Bengio raises important questions about the rapid advancement of AI, and how to mitigate its risks.
stories.Tweet: Let's hear what the experts have to say 📦 Known as one of the "godfathers" of artificial intelligence, Yoshua Bengio raises important questions about the rapid advancement of AI, and how to mitigate its risks. #ai https://www.bbc.com/news/technology-65760449

stories.Title: Don't worry about your next meeting
stories.Description: You can catch up on meetings even if you missed them with Microsoft Teams' latest feature, Intelligent Recap, including AI-generated notes, recommended tasks, and personalized highlights.

stories.Title: Not just a humanoid robot, but also a poet
stories.Description: Ameca, a robot powered by AI that speaks multiple languages, composes poetry, and even sketches on command, has made waves at the International Conference on Robotics and Automation this week.

stories.Title: The wait is almost over…

stories.Title: The power of Bluetooth in space
stories.Description: Hubble Network, a Seattle-based startup, is on a mission to launch a satellite network that offers global access to any Bluetooth device, taking connectivity to a whole different level.
stories.Tweet: The power of Bluetooth in space 📦 Hubble Network, a Seattle-based startup, is on a mission to launch a satellite network that offers global access to any Bluetooth device, taking connectivity to a whole different level. #startups https://techcrunch.com/2023/05/31/hubble-network-is-building-out-a-space-based-bluetooth-network-to-connect-over-billion-devices/

stories.Title: Meet JetZero
stories.Description: This aviation start-up is redefining the commercial jetliner with its blended wing body design, offering wider seats, quieter engines, and less fuel consumption.
